feed.title: IQDevs Blog
feed.subtitle: IQDevs is a Facebook group of technical Iraqi enthusiasts holding skills from various technical backgrounds spanning all over the globe. From Iraq to EU countries to North America, people who share a homeland and a passion for skill enhancement, sharing ideas and following bleeding edge technical trends. We focus to upgrade our knowledge and our limit is the sky.

entry.title: Submitting Posts
entry.content:
This post was written with the intention of walking you through the process of writing a post and submitting it for review.

If any of the bits and pieces discussed here is not clear, donâ€™t hesitate to hit me (Fadi Hanna Al-Kass) up.
entry.summary: This post was written with the intention of walking you through the process of writing a post and submitting it for review.
